title: @Riot please tell me that I get a second chance for my beloved Icon...please
body:
So 2 years ago when Camille was released we got  the Piltover event. And I loved it...Specially one champion from there. So I wanted that icon...I pressed the button and I waited as the site said...And time passed and I got nothing. My friends got the Piltover Icon but I.... I contacted Riot support and I sent them screenshots of the side with the message wait until some date..And sadly that was not strong evidence...Few months later I asked again and nothing.....I really really hope I get a chance for my beloved Piltover Icon in this exploration of Runeterra missions ..
Please RIot.

replies.body: I would recommend you checking out the missions today! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Tahm Hiddleston,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IPf1pKTa,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-07-25T15:18:34.221+0000)
>
> I would recommend you checking out the missions today! :D

For players who join later or miss this event, do you think you could maybe just put these faction icons on the shop afterwards? I mean, we got them for free, would it be so bad to let players buy them afterwards? I don't feel this way for every icon, but the ability to rep your favorite faction seems like an option that should always be there if you want it
No current plans to release them for purchase. I imagine we will find ways to get them out again in the future to make sure everyone has a chance to get them.

For new players, maybe consider slotting them into the lower level missions at certain points as a way to incentivize learning a bit more about the lore and trying out different champions.

For people who just miss the event, maybe have a monthly/biweekly rotating icon mission.

Good to have soon a freljord icon, got already the shurima one. 
But i am still sad that i still can't aquire the 3 freljord tribe icons from that past event. I think that event happened jsut as i joined league, but as a beginner i had no ideathat that event existed or how to enter, i just saw everyone runnigna round with these icon.
Especially the avarrosa icon, the bow that asheuses i would like to have.
Wonder if i evel will get this icon maybe in a chest, but the chances are like soooooooo small.

(also while i understand the old shurima icons were given with the ascension game mode, i would have prefered them to be under the region set. I mean other gamemode icons like star guardian are also in a seperate set even if you jsut got them with invasion ).

I'm not opposed to faction icons being buyable but the "we got them for free" argument is not a good argument. You could use it for Victorious Skins as well: "we got them for free, would it be so bad to let players buy them afterwards?". Well yes because it completely devalues the value of a collector/hard to get item.

Again, not the case here with faction icons, they aren't hard to get if you put your mind to it. Just sayin',  that argument ain't good.

I said it because defending good causes (give newer players an opportunity to get those icons) with bad arguments (we get them for free now) is a terrible terrible idea.

Defending good causes with bad arguments just opens the door to your bad arguments being bashed down and your causes looking weaker than they actually are. It's counter-productive and against your own interest.
